description:
Pump your arms to run like the wind, not to keep your hands warm. Lightweight running gloves with wind-blocking panels fend off the chill of a brisk morning run. Thumbs and forefingers are touchscreen-compatible so you can take a photo of the sunrise without getting cold hands, and a hidden key pocket keeps your key safe.

  • Shell is polyester with Windstop panels on back of hand
  • Hidden pocket on back of hand keeps your keys secure
  • Touchscreen-compatible patches on thumbs and forefingers let you change your playlist on the go
  • Reflective details for excellent added visibility
name: Auclair Pacer Run Gloves - Unisex
